## FilterStringTypeInput interface

Defines a filter for an input string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FilterStringTypeInput 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [eq?](./magento-api.filterstringtypeinput.eq.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Filters items that are exactly the same as the specified string. |
|  [in?](./magento-api.filterstringtypeinput.in.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Filters items that are exactly the same as entries specified in an array of strings. |
|  [match?](./magento-api.filterstringtypeinput.match.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Defines a filter that performs a fuzzy search using the specified string. |
